gw.api.util

Class CurrencyUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • gw.api.util.CurrencyUtil

  • public class CurrencyUtil
extends Object
    Helpful methods for dealing with currencies and currency conversion.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static Currency DefaultCurrency
      Get the default currency, specified in the DefaultApplicationCurrency config.xml parameter.
      static IDataType ExchangeRateDataType
      static MathContext ExchangeRateMathContext
      static com.guidewire.pl.domain.currency.config.MultiCurrencyDisplayMode MultiCurrencyDisplayMode
      static boolean MultiCurrencyMode
      True if the UI should be in multi-currency mode.
      static Currency ReportingCurrency
      Get the reporting currency (same as Default currency for now).
      static RoundingMode RoundingMode
      The Default RoundingMode to the be used during monetary calculations. The is the enum value for the config parameter DefaultRoundingMode in config.xml See Java's enum RoundingMode for possible values. See also Transaction.RoundingMode.
      static boolean SingleCurrencyMode
      True if the UI should be in single-currency mode.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static CurrencyAmountPair addSecondaryMoneyComponent(CurrencyAmount primaryAmount, Currency secondaryCurrency, BigDecimal exchangeRate)
      Calls primaryAmount.addSecondaryMoneyComponent, unless primaryAmount is null.
      static BigDecimal calcInverseExchangeRate(BigDecimal exchangeRate)
      Calculates ONE divided by the given exchangeRate, rounded to the precision of ExchangeRates in the system. Consider using instead: {@link #convertAmount(BigDecimal, Currency, Currency, BigDecimal, boolean)}.
      static CurrencyAmount checkCurrencyAmountCurrency(CurrencyAmount value, Currency requiredCurrency)
      Checks the value of a BigDecimal or CurrencyAmount to be set in a money column to see if it has the required Currency. Note: In the future this may round the value based on the storageScale of the Currency.
      static BigDecimal cleanseCurrency(CurrencyAmount value)
      Ensures a BigDecimal/CurrencyAmount does not have a currency.
      static CurrencyAmount convertAmount(BigDecimal amount, Currency amountCurrency, Currency toCurrency, BigDecimal exchangeRateOverride, boolean rateIsToCurrencyRate, RoundingMode roundingMode)
      Converts the BigDecimal amount in the given amountCurrency to a CurrencyAmount with toCurrency, using the given ExchangeRate. If ExchangeRate is null, looks up the current market Rate.
      static CurrencyAmount convertAmount(IMoney amount, Currency amountCurrency, Currency toCurrency, BigDecimal exchangeRateOverride)
      Converts the CurrencyAmount in the given amountCurrency to a CurrencyAmount with toCurrency, using the given ExchangeRate. If ExchangeRate is null, looks up the current market rate.
      static CurrencyAmount convertAmount(IMoney amount, Currency amountCurrency, Currency toCurrency, BigDecimal exchangeRateOverride, boolean rateIsToCurrencyRate)
      Converts the BigDecimal amount in the given amountCurrency to a CurrencyAmount with toCurrency, using the given ExchangeRate. If ExchangeRate is null, looks up the current market Rate. Uses the default rounding mode returned by {@link #getRoundingMode()}.
      static CurrencyAmount convertAmount(IMoney amount, Currency amountCurrency, Currency toCurrency, BigDecimal exchangeRateOverride, boolean rateIsToCurrencyRate, RoundingMode roundingMode)
      Converts the BigDecimal amount in the given amountCurrency to a CurrencyAmount with toCurrency, using the given ExchangeRate. If ExchangeRate is null, looks up the current market Rate.
      static CurrencyAmount convertAmount(BigDecimal amount, Currency amountCurrency, Currency toCurrency, BigDecimal exchangeRateOverride)
      Converts the BigDecimal amount in the given amountCurrency to a CurrencyAmount with toCurrency, using the given ExchangeRate. If ExchangeRate is null, looks up the current market rate.
      static CurrencyAmount convertAmount(BigDecimal amount, Currency amountCurrency, Currency toCurrency, BigDecimal exchangeRateOverride, boolean rateIsToCurrencyRate)
      Converts the BigDecimal amount in the given amountCurrency to a CurrencyAmount with toCurrency, using the given ExchangeRate. If ExchangeRate is null, looks up the current market Rate. Uses the default rounding mode returned by {@link #getRoundingMode()}.
      static ExchangeRate createCustomExchangeRateWithSet(BigDecimal exchangeRate, String description, Currency fromCurrency, Currency toCurrency, Bundle bundle)
      Creates a custom ExchangeRate entity for when the user provides a manual exchangeRate override. Only exposed to Gosu for use with RITransactionSet.newXXX() methods, in order to pass in a custom ExchangeRate for the ClaimToReportingExchangeRate when creating a new RITransaction. For Transaction, BulkInvoice, and other multicurrency entities, you should use fields on those entities to setup a manual exchange rate, such as the OverrideTransToClaimExchangeRate and TransToClaimExchangeRateRate properties on Transaction.
      static ExchangeRate createExchangeRate(Currency baseCurrency, Currency priceCurrency, BigDecimal rate)
      Creates an ExchangeRate without an ExchangeRateSet in the current Gosu bundle (Transaction.Current)
      static ExchangeRateSet createMarketExchangeRateSet(String name, String description, Date effectiveDate, Date expireDate, List<ExchangeRate> rates)
      Creates an ExchangeRateSet based on a collection of market ExchangeRates
      static String getCurrencyFormatExpression(Currency currency)
      Generates a Pebbles formatting expression for the indicated currency. The resulting expression prefixes the field with the currency's symbol (e.g., $) and appends the currency's abbreviation (e.g., USD, EUR, GBP, etc.) as a suffix.
      static Currency getDefaultCurrency()
      Get the default currency, specified in the DefaultApplicationCurrency config.xml parameter.
      static BigDecimal getMarketExchangeRate(Currency from, Currency to)
      Get the ExchangeRate by which to multiply the amount in the from Currency to get the equivalent amount in the to currency. null Currency is treated as the Default currency
      static ExchangeRate getMarketExchangeRateEntity(Currency from, Currency to)
      Get the ExchangeRateEntity that contains an exchange rate from one currency to another. null Currency is treated as the Default currency.
      static Currency getReportingCurrency()
      Get the reporting currency (same as Default currency for now).
      static RoundingMode getRoundingMode()
      The Default RoundingMode to the be used during monetary calculations. The is the enum value for the config parameter DefaultRoundingMode in config.xml See Java's enum RoundingMode for possible values. See also Transaction.RoundingMode.
      static int getStorageScale(Currency currency)
      Get the storage scale of the currency.
      static void invokeMarketExchangeRateSetPlugin()
      Creates and commits a new ExchangeRateSet using IExchangeRateSetPlugin.
      static boolean isMultiCurrencyMode()
      True if the UI should be in multi-currency mode.
      static boolean isSingleCurrencyMode()
      True if the UI should be in single-currency mode.
      static String renderAsCurrency(BigDecimal amount, Currency currency)
      Returns a string representing the BigDecimal formatted as a money amount in the given Currency. Renders null as blank. Renders zero as the number 0, instead of using zeroValue attribute from CurrencyFormat.
      static String renderAsCurrency(BigDecimal amount, Currency currency, boolean useZeroValue)
      Returns a string representing the BigDecimal formatted as a money amount in the given Currency. Renders null as blank. Uses the zeroValue attribute from CurrencyFormat if the useZeroValue argument is true.
      static String renderAsCurrency(IMoney amount)
      Returns a string representing the CurrencyAmount argument. Renders null as blank. Renders zero as the number 0, instead of using zeroValue attribute from CurrencyFormat.
      static CurrencyAmount roundToCurrencyScale(BigDecimal amount, Currency currency, RoundingMode roundingMode)
      Round to the scale/fraction digits (i.e. storageScale) for the CurrencyAmount's currency. A null currency arg will round to the storageScale of the default currency.
      static BigDecimal toBigDecimal(String value, Currency currency)
      Parses a string into a BigDecimal
      static CurrencyAmount toCurrencyAmount(String value, Currency currency)
      Parses a string into a CurrencyAmount

        exchangeRate -
        Returns:
        primaryAmount.addSecondaryMoneyComponent(secondaryCurrency, exchangeRate)

      • calcInverseExchangeRate

        BigDecimal calcInverseExchangeRate(BigDecimal exchangeRate)
        Calculates ONE divided by the given exchangeRate, rounded to the precision of ExchangeRates in the system. Consider using instead: {@link #convertAmount(BigDecimal, Currency, Currency, BigDecimal, boolean)}.
        Parameters:
        exchangeRate -
        Returns:

      • checkCurrencyAmountCurrency

        CurrencyAmount checkCurrencyAmountCurrency(CurrencyAmount value,
                                         Currency requiredCurrency)
        Checks the value of a BigDecimal or CurrencyAmount to be set in a money column to see if it has the required Currency.

        Note: In the future this may round the value based on the storageScale of the Currency.

        Parameters:
        value - BigDecimal or CurrencyAmount
        requiredCurrency - currency in which a CurrencyAmount value must be. Use the Currency entity property for the money amount column value. For example: TransactionLineItem.Transaction.Currency or Check.Currency
        Returns:
        the same value if OK, or throws IllegalArgumentException if a CurrencyAmount with wrong currency.

      • cleanseCurrency

        BigDecimal cleanseCurrency(CurrencyAmount value)
        Ensures a BigDecimal/CurrencyAmount does not have a currency.
        Parameters:
        value - BigDecimal or CurrencyAmount
        Returns:
        the same value if OK (a BigDecimal or CurrencyAmount with null currency) or a new BigDecimal.

      • convertAmount

        CurrencyAmount convertAmount(BigDecimal amount,
                           Currency amountCurrency,
                           Currency toCurrency,
                           BigDecimal exchangeRateOverride,
                           boolean rateIsToCurrencyRate,
                           RoundingMode roundingMode)
        Converts the BigDecimal amount in the given amountCurrency to a CurrencyAmount with toCurrency, using the given ExchangeRate. If ExchangeRate is null, looks up the current market Rate.
        Parameters:
        amount -
        amountCurrency -
        toCurrency -
        exchangeRateOverride - the exchange rate to use instead of a current market rate
        rateIsToCurrencyRate - direction of the exchangeRate. if true (default), new amount is amount.multiply(exchangeRate). if false, new amount is amount.divide(exchangeRate).
        roundingMode - roundingMode to use when rounding result to match the storageScale of toCurrency Use Transaction.RoundingMode if appropriate. null will use CurrencyUtil.RoundingMode.
        Returns:

      • convertAmount

        CurrencyAmount convertAmount(IMoney amount,
                           Currency amountCurrency,
                           Currency toCurrency,
                           BigDecimal exchangeRateOverride)
        Converts the CurrencyAmount in the given amountCurrency to a CurrencyAmount with toCurrency, using the given ExchangeRate. If ExchangeRate is null, looks up the current market rate.
        Parameters:
        amount -
        amountCurrency -
        toCurrency -
        exchangeRateOverride - the new amount is amount.multiply(exchangeRateOverride). If null, looks up the currency market rate.
        Returns:

      • convertAmount

        CurrencyAmount convertAmount(IMoney amount,
                           Currency amountCurrency,
                           Currency toCurrency,
                           BigDecimal exchangeRateOverride,
                           boolean rateIsToCurrencyRate)
        Converts the BigDecimal amount in the given amountCurrency to a CurrencyAmount with toCurrency, using the given ExchangeRate. If ExchangeRate is null, looks up the current market Rate. Uses the default rounding mode returned by {@link #getRoundingMode()}.
        Parameters:
        amount -
        amountCurrency -
        toCurrency -
        exchangeRateOverride - the exchange rate to use instead of a current market rate
        rateIsToCurrencyRate - direction of the exchangeRate. if true (default), new amount is amount.multiply(exchangeRate). if false, new amount is amount.divide(exchangeRate).
        Returns:

      • convertAmount

        CurrencyAmount convertAmount(IMoney amount,
                           Currency amountCurrency,
                           Currency toCurrency,
                           BigDecimal exchangeRateOverride,
                           boolean rateIsToCurrencyRate,
                           RoundingMode roundingMode)
        Converts the BigDecimal amount in the given amountCurrency to a CurrencyAmount with toCurrency, using the given ExchangeRate. If ExchangeRate is null, looks up the current market Rate.
        Parameters:
        amount -
        amountCurrency -
        toCurrency -
        exchangeRateOverride - the exchange rate to use instead of a current market rate
        rateIsToCurrencyRate - direction of the exchangeRate. if true (default), new amount is amount.multiply(exchangeRate). if false, new amount is amount.divide(exchangeRate).
        roundingMode - roundingMode to use when rounding result to match the storageScale of toCurrency Use Transaction.RoundingMode if appropriate. null will use CurrencyUtil.RoundingMode.
        Returns:

        amountCurrency -

      • convertAmount

        CurrencyAmount convertAmount(BigDecimal amount,
                           Currency amountCurrency,
                           Currency toCurrency,
                           BigDecimal exchangeRateOverride,
                           boolean rateIsToCurrencyRate)
        Converts the BigDecimal amount in the given amountCurrency to a CurrencyAmount with toCurrency, using the given ExchangeRate. If ExchangeRate is null, looks up the current market Rate. Uses the default rounding mode returned by {@link #getRoundingMode()}.
        Parameters:
        amount -
        amountCurrency -
        toCurrency -
        exchangeRateOverride - the exchange rate to use instead of a current market rate
        rateIsToCurrencyRate - direction of the exchangeRate. if true (default), new amount is amount.multiply(exchangeRate). if false, new amount is amount.divide(exchangeRate).
        Returns:

      • createCustomExchangeRateWithSet

        ExchangeRate createCustomExchangeRateWithSet(BigDecimal exchangeRate,
                                           String description,
                                           Currency fromCurrency,
                                           Currency toCurrency,
                                           Bundle bundle)
        Creates a custom ExchangeRate entity for when the user provides a manual exchangeRate override.

        Only exposed to Gosu for use with RITransactionSet.newXXX() methods, in order to pass in a custom ExchangeRate for the ClaimToReportingExchangeRate when creating a new RITransaction.

        For Transaction, BulkInvoice, and other multicurrency entities, you should use fields on those entities to setup a manual exchange rate, such as the OverrideTransToClaimExchangeRate and TransToClaimExchangeRateRate properties on Transaction.
        Parameters:
        exchangeRate -
        description -
        fromCurrency -
        toCurrency -
        bundle -
        Returns:

      • createExchangeRate

        ExchangeRate createExchangeRate(Currency baseCurrency,
                              Currency priceCurrency,
                              BigDecimal rate)
        Creates an ExchangeRate without an ExchangeRateSet in the current Gosu bundle (Transaction.Current)
        Parameters:
        baseCurrency -
        priceCurrency -
        rate -
        Returns:

      • createMarketExchangeRateSet

        ExchangeRateSet createMarketExchangeRateSet(String name,
                                          String description,
                                          Date effectiveDate,
                                          Date expireDate,
                                          List<ExchangeRate> rates)
        Creates an ExchangeRateSet based on a collection of market ExchangeRates
        Parameters:
        name -
        description -
        effectiveDate -
        expireDate - if null, the ExchangeRateSet doesn't expire
        rates - cannot be null or empty
        Returns:

      • getCurrencyFormatExpression

        String getCurrencyFormatExpression(Currency currency)
        Generates a Pebbles formatting expression for the indicated currency. The resulting expression prefixes the field with the currency's symbol (e.g., $) and appends the currency's abbreviation (e.g., USD, EUR, GBP, etc.) as a suffix.
        Parameters:
        currency - the Currency for which to generate a formatting expression
        Returns:
        a String containing the Pebbles formatting expression.

      • getDefaultCurrency

        Currency getDefaultCurrency()
        Get the default currency, specified in the DefaultApplicationCurrency config.xml parameter.
        Returns:

      • getMarketExchangeRate

        BigDecimal getMarketExchangeRate(Currency from,
                               Currency to)
        Get the ExchangeRate by which to multiply the amount in the from Currency to get the equivalent amount in the to currency. null Currency is treated as the Default currency
        Parameters:
        from - base currency converting from
        to - currency you are converting to.
        Returns:
        rate, such that FromCurrencyAmount * rate = ToCurrencyAmount.

      • getMarketExchangeRateEntity

        ExchangeRate getMarketExchangeRateEntity(Currency from,
                                       Currency to)
        Get the ExchangeRateEntity that contains an exchange rate from one currency to another. null Currency is treated as the Default currency.
        Parameters:
        from - base currency converting from
        to - currency you are converting to.
        Returns:
        ExchangeRateEntity, such that FromCurrencyAmount * rate = ToCurrencyAmount.

      • getReportingCurrency

        Currency getReportingCurrency()
        Get the reporting currency (same as Default currency for now).
        Returns:

      • getRoundingMode

        RoundingMode getRoundingMode()
        The Default RoundingMode to the be used during monetary calculations. The is the enum value for the config parameter DefaultRoundingMode in config.xml See Java's enum RoundingMode for possible values. See also Transaction.RoundingMode.
        Returns:

      • getStorageScale

        int getStorageScale(Currency currency)
        Get the storage scale of the currency.
        Parameters:
        currency -
        Returns:

        True if the UI should be in single-currency mode.

      • renderAsCurrency

        String renderAsCurrency(BigDecimal amount,
                      Currency currency)
        Returns a string representing the BigDecimal formatted as a money amount in the given Currency. Renders null as blank. Renders zero as the number 0, instead of using zeroValue attribute from CurrencyFormat.
        Parameters:
        amount - the CurrencyAmount to display as a string
        currency -
        Returns:
        string representing the CurrencyAmount

      • renderAsCurrency

        String renderAsCurrency(BigDecimal amount,
                      Currency currency,
                      boolean useZeroValue)
        Returns a string representing the BigDecimal formatted as a money amount in the given Currency. Renders null as blank. Uses the zeroValue attribute from CurrencyFormat if the useZeroValue argument is true.
        Parameters:
        amount - the BigDecimal amount to display as a string
        currency - the currency format to use
        useZeroValue - true if the zeroValue attribute, such as a "-", should be used. false to render zero as a number.
        Returns:
        string representing the CurrencyAmount

      • renderAsCurrency

        String renderAsCurrency(IMoney amount)
        Returns a string representing the CurrencyAmount argument. Renders null as blank. Renders zero as the number 0, instead of using zeroValue attribute from CurrencyFormat.
        Parameters:
        amount - the CurrencyAmount to display as a string
        Returns:
        string representing the CurrencyAmount

        roundingMode -
        Returns:
